title: Services - Peninsula Integrative Medicine
cleaned_text: Do you wonder what your lab values really mean? How do you treat without medication? What can you do with your diet and lifestyle to prevent illness? We can answer these questions and more. Your child's first years are full of many milestones and many more questions. Our pediatrician provides support for general health, vaccination questions, and everything in between, including after hours and sick visits. Hypothyroidism, fertility, adrenal dysfunction and blood sugar issues are a just few of the conditions we treat with functional endocrinology. We can help you to decrease dependency on medication and restore balance. Having digestive problems, such as IBS, can take over your life. We use unique tools to diagnose and treat digestive disorders that are usually missed by conventional approaches. Steeped in thousands of years of tradition, almost all health conditions can benefit from layering Chinese medicine into the treatment plan. The journey into parenthood can be stressful. We love helping couples make a plan to sail through this journey with the support they need to have a healthy, happy pregnancy. Hormone balance can have a profound impact on the way we look and feel. We always opt for the most gentle approach to support a woman's unique physiology. What happens when your symptoms don't have a diagnosis? We specialize in untangling complex conditions including Lyme disease, Mast Cell Activation Disorder, PANS, PANDAS, and Mold Illness. How do you achieve the best outcomes when facing a cancer diagnosis? Integrative oncology is an evidence-based natural approach to be used alongside conventional cancer care. We are here to support you every step of the way.
